content: warm one hat by betsy teitler yarnhabit a simple basic double brimmed hat in bulky yarn a quick knit makes a snuggly warm hat great for charity knitting each batch of these hats brings more requests for the recipe so here it is materials yarn 1 skein bulky yarn of choice - lamb s pride bulky or similar or worsted held double needles us 10 16 circular and double points or whatever size you prefer for bulky knitting notions stitch marker darning needle finished size 18 20 unstretched smaller size fits a school-age child larger size fits teens and adults the recipe cast on 56 64 stitches join in the round place marker k1p1 for 20 22 row knit for 20 22 row begin decrease rounds r1 k6 k2tog repeat to end of round r2 knit r3 k5 k2tog repeat to end of round r4 knit r5 k4 k2tog repeat to end of round r6 knit r7 k3 k2tog repeat to end of round r8 knit r9 k2 k2tog repeat to end of round r10 k1 k2tog repeat to end of round r11 k2tog repeat to end of round break yarn pull tail through remaining stitches and pull gently to close the circle weave in ends remembering that brim flips up to show the underside out fold brim halfway up congrats you ve warmed one thanks for trying this pattern any questions/concerns/ideas pm me yarnhabit on ravelry 3/2/15
